dmca.title: Individual complains of blog copying
dmca.body:
Dear Google.com, Blogger.com, and Blogspot.com: 

It has come to my attention that you have made an unauthorized use of my copyrighted work entitled Izzy Charm in the preparation of a work derived therefrom. I have reserved all rights in the Work, first published in December 2001, and have registered copyright therein. Your work entitled Church of Annette http://churchofannette.blogspot.com/ is essentially identical to the Work and clearly used the Work as its basis.

As you neither asked for nor received permission to use the Work as the basis for Izzy Charm nor to make or distribute copies, including electronic copies, of same, I believe you have willfully infringed my rights under 17 U.S.C. Section 101 et seq. and could be liable for statutory damages as high as $150,000 as set forth in Section 504(c)(2) therein. 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

I demand that you immediately cease the use and distribution of all infringing works derived from the Work, and all copies, including electronic copies, of same, that you deliver to me, if applicable, all unused, undistributed copies of same, or destroy such copies immediately and that you desist from this or any other infringement of my rights in the future. If I have not received an affirmative response from you by April 15, 2006 indicating that you have fully complied with these requirements, I shall take further action against you. My full legal name (first ,middle and/or last) shall be kept private from the person(s) who are currently posting on http://churchofannette.blogspot.com/ or any other site associated with it. Due to the harassment generated by this website and it
